name: withdraw_stake
attributes: # [doc = " NFT のアンステークと返却を行うが、アカウント照合がない"]
body: let stake_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . stake_account ;
let current_time = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
let fee = (elapsed as u64) . checked_mul (ctx . accounts . config . withdraw_fee_rate) . unwrap () ;
stake_acc . rewards = stake_acc . rewards . checked_sub (fee) . unwrap () ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . service_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts ,) ;

fields.name: stake_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ステーク NFT 保管用アカウント (Vault)"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーの NFT 受取用アカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: service_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CPI 実行権限を持つサービス権限アカウント"]

fields.name: token_program
fields.attribute: # [doc = " SPL トークンプログラム"]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料レートを保持する設定アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このステークを所有するユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ステーキング対象の NFT ミント"]

fields.name: staked_at
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ステーキング開始時刻 (UNIX タイムスタンプ)"]

fields.name: active
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ステーク状態 (true=有効, false=解除済)"]

fields.name: withdraw_fee_rate
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 引き出し時の単位手数料 (トークン／秒)"]
